verses.verse: And <WG2532> I stood<WG2476> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> sand<WG285> of the<WG3588> sea,<WG2281> and<WG2532> saw<WG1492> a beast<WG2342> rise up<WG305> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> sea,<WG2281> having<WG2192> seven<WG2033> heads<WG2776> and<WG2532> ten<WG1176> horns,<WG2768> and<WG2532> upon<WG1909> his<WG848> horns<WG2768> ten<WG1176> crowns,<WG1238> and<WG2532> upon<WG1909> his<WG848> heads<WG2776> the name<WG3686> of blasphemy.<WG988>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> beast<WG2342> which<WG3739> I saw<WG1492> was<WG2258> like unto<WG3664> a leopard,<WG3917> and<WG2532> his<WG848> feet<WG4228> were as<WG5613> the feet of a bear,<WG715> and<WG2532> his<WG848> mouth<WG4750> as<WG5613> the mouth<WG4750> of a lion:<WG3023> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> dragon<WG1404> gave<WG1325> him<WG846> his<WG848> power,<WG1411> and<WG2532> his<WG848> seat,<WG2362> and<WG2532> great<WG3173> authority.<WG1849>

And <WG2532> I saw<WG1492> one<WG3391> of his<WG848> heads<WG2776> as it were<WG5613> wounded<WG4969> to<WG1519> death;<WG2288> and<WG2532> his<WG848> deadly<WG2288> wound<WG4127> was healed:<WG2323> and<WG2532> all<WG3650> the<WG3588> world<WG1093> wondered<WG2296> after<WG3694> the<WG3588> beast.<WG2342>

And <WG2532> they worshiped<WG4352> the<WG3588> dragon<WG1404> which<WG3739> gave<WG1325> power<WG1849> unto the<WG3588> beast:<WG2342> and<WG2532> they worshiped<WG4352> the<WG3588> beast,<WG2342> saying,<WG3004> Who<WG5101> is like unto<WG3664> the<WG3588> beast?<WG2342> who<WG5101> is able<WG1410> to make war<WG4170> with<WG3326> him?<WG846>

And <WG2532> there was given<WG1325> unto him<WG846> a mouth<WG4750> speaking<WG2980> great things<WG3173> and<WG2532> blasphemies;<WG988> and<WG2532> power<WG1849> was given<WG1325> unto him<WG846> to continue<WG4160> forty and two<WG5062> <WG1417> months.<WG3376>

And <WG2532> he opened<WG455> his<WG848> mouth<WG4750> in<WG1519> blasphemy<WG988> against<WG4314> God,<WG2316> to blaspheme<WG987> his<WG848> name,<WG3686> and<WG2532> his<WG848> tabernacle,<WG4633> and<WG2532> them that dwell<WG4637> in<WG1722> heaven.<WG3772>

And <WG2532> it was given<WG1325> unto him<WG846> to make<WG4160> war<WG4171> with<WG3326> the<WG3588> saints,<WG40> and<WG2532> to overcome<WG3528> them:<WG846> and<WG2532> power<WG1849> was given<WG1325> him<WG846> over<WG1909> all<WG3956> kindreds,<WG5443> and<WG2532> tongues,<WG1100> and<WG2532> nations.<WG1484>

And <WG2532> all<WG3956> that dwell<WG2730> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> earth<WG1093> shall worship<WG4352> him,<WG846> whose<WG3739> names<WG3686> are not<WG3756> written<WG1125> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> book<WG976> of life<WG2222> of the<WG3588> Lamb<WG721> slain<WG4969> from<WG575> the foundation<WG2602> of the world.<WG2889>
If any man<WG1536> have<WG2192> an ear,<WG3775> let him hear.<WG191>

He that<WG1536> leadeth into<WG4863> captivity<WG161> shall go<WG5217> into<WG1519> captivity:<WG161> he that<WG1536> killeth<WG615> with<WG1722> the sword<WG3162> must<WG1163> be<WG846> killed<WG615> with<WG1722> the sword.<WG3162> Here<WG5602> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> patience<WG5281> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> faith<WG4102> of the<WG3588> saints.<WG40>

And <WG2532> I beheld<WG1492> another<WG243> beast<WG2342> coming up<WG305> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> earth;<WG1093> and<WG2532> he had<WG2192> two<WG1417> horns<WG2768> like<WG3664> a lamb,<WG721> and<WG2532> he spake<WG2980> as<WG5613> a dragon.<WG1404>

And <WG2532> he exerciseth<WG4160> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> power<WG1849> of the<WG3588> first<WG4413> beast<WG2342> before<WG1799> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> causeth<WG4160> the<WG3588> earth<WG1093> and<WG2532> them which dwell<WG2730> therein<WG1722> <WG846> to<WG2443> worship<WG4352> the<WG3588> first<WG4413> beast,<WG2342> whose<WG3739> deadly wound<WG848> <WG2288> <WG4127> was healed.<WG2323>

And <WG2532> he doeth<WG4160> great<WG3173> wonders,<WG4592> so that<WG2443> he<WG2532> maketh<WG4160> fire<WG4442> come down<WG2597> from<WG1537> heaven<WG3772> on<WG1519> the<WG3588> earth<WG1093> in the sight<WG1799> of men,<WG444>

And <WG2532> deceiveth<WG4105> them that dwell<WG2730> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> earth<WG1093> by<WG1223> the means of those miracles<WG4592> which<WG3739> he had power<WG1325> <WG846> to do<WG4160> in the sight<WG1799> of the<WG3588> beast;<WG2342> saying<WG3004> to them that dwell<WG2730> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> that they should make<WG4160> an image<WG1504> to the<WG3588> beast,<WG2342> which<WG3739> had<WG2192> the<WG3588> wound<WG4127> by a sword,<WG3162> and<WG2532> did live.<WG2198>

And <WG2532> he had power<WG1325> <WG846> to give<WG1325> life<WG4151> unto the<WG3588> image<WG1504> of the<WG3588> beast,<WG2342> that<WG2443> the<WG3588> image<WG1504> of the<WG3588> beast<WG2342> should both<WG2532> speak,<WG2980> and<WG2532> cause<WG4160> that as many as<WG3745> <WG302> would not<WG3361> worship<WG4352> the<WG3588> image<WG1504> of the<WG3588> beast<WG2342> should<WG2443> be killed.<WG615>

And <WG2532> he causeth<WG4160> all,<WG3956> both small<WG3398> and<WG2532> great,<WG3173> <WG2532> rich<WG4145> and<WG2532> poor,<WG4434> <WG2532> free<WG1658> and<WG2532> bond,<WG1401> to<WG2443> receive<WG1325> <WG846> a mark<WG5480> in<WG1909> their<WG848> right<WG1188> hand,<WG5495> or<WG2228> in<WG1909> their<WG848> foreheads: <WG3359>

And <WG2532> that<WG2443> no<WG3361> man<WG5100> might<WG1410> buy<WG59> or<WG2228> sell,<WG4453> save<WG1508> he that had<WG2192> the<WG3588> mark,<WG5480> or<WG2228> the<WG3588> name<WG3686> of the<WG3588> beast,<WG2342> or<WG2228> the<WG3588> number<WG706> of his<WG848> name.<WG3686>

Here <WG5602> is<WG2076> wisdom.<WG4678> Let him that hath<WG2192> understanding<WG3563> count<WG5585> the<WG3588> number<WG706> of the<WG3588> beast:<WG2342> for<WG1063> it is<WG2076> the number<WG706> of a man;<WG444> and<WG2532> his<WG848> number<WG706> is Six hundred threescore and six.<WG5516>
